net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: o5e_Parser_parseSpellcasting
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a monster toon, return the Spellcasting object:

{
	"ability": "Charisma",
	"level": 8,
	"saveDC": 14,
	"spellList": "wizard",
	"spells": {
		"at will": ["fire bolt", "minor illusion", "poison spray"],
		"1st level" : ["burning hands", "mage armor", "magic missile"],
		"2nd level" : ["hold person", "mirror image", "misty step"]
		}
}
If the monstertoon has no Spellcasting special ability, an empty object is returned. For Innate spellcasters, the spellList will be "innate" and spells will be keyed as "n/day" instead of "nth level".
